message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $13,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Could you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $10,000 is a tempting offer, the true value of this product is significantly higher. I could consider letting it go for $12,000.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $11,000?
